subject: Homosexuality and Bisexuality
Transgender and Transsexuals
College Athletics
Civil Rights and Liberties
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The Indianapolis-based organization joined Indiana Competes, a coalition of business working to persuade Indiana lawmakers to protect the rights of lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people.
snippet: The Indianapolis-based organization joined Indiana Competes, a coalition of business working to persuade Indiana lawmakers to protect the rights of lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender people.
